Container.Name: webhook.site Backend
Container.Overview: (Backend) A website to generate unique, random URLs that you can use to test and debug Webhooks and HTTP requests, as well as to create your own workflows.
Container.Requires: Requires a separate Redis database and "webhook.site Frontend" (also available in Community Applications).

Config.Description: Frontend URL. Replace with IP and port of the frontend.
